resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107909</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107909</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085961</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The problem-centered classroom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Problem-zentrierte Klassenzimmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La salle de classe problème-centrée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A sala de aula problema-centrada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'aula problema-centrata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πρόβλημα-κεντροθετημένη τάξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La sala de clase problema-centrada</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A look inside an eighth-grade classroom in which students work in pairs to solve problems, then debate as a class which solution is correct or easiest. An explanation of the teaching method is provided along with video of students presenting their solutions to problems.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Blick innerhalb eines Achtgrad Klassenzimmers,
in dem Kursteilnehmer in den Paaren arbeiten, um Probleme zu lösen, 
debattieren dann als Kategorie, die Lösung korrekt oder am 
einfachsten ist. Eine Erklärung der unterrichtenden Methode 
wird zusammen mit Bildschirm der Kursteilnehmer zur Verfügung 
gestellt, die ihre Lösungen Problemen darstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un regard à l'intérieur d'une salle de classe de
huitième-catégorie dans laquelle les étudiants travaillent dans les
paires pour résoudre des problèmes, discutent alors comme classe qui
la solution est correcte ou la plus facile. Une explication de 
la méthode d'enseignement est équipée le long de vidéo des 
étudiants présent leurs solutions aux problèmes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um olhar dentro de uma sala de aula da 
oitavo-classe em que os estudantes trabalham em pares para resolver 
problemas, debate então como uma classe que a solução seja correta 
ou a mais fácil. Uma explanação do método ensinando é 
fornecida junto com o vídeo dos estudantes que apresentam suas 
soluções aos problemas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno sguardo all'interno di un'aula del 
ottavo-grado in cui gli allievi lavorano negli accoppiamenti per 
risolvere i problemi, allora dibatte come codice categoria che la 
soluzione è corretta o più facile. Una spiegazione del metodo 
d'istruzione è fornita con il video degli allievi che presentano le 
loro soluzioni ai problemi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα βλέμμα μέσα σε μια τάξη όγδοος-βαθμού στην 
οποία οι σπουδαστές εργάζονται ανά τα ζευγάρια για να λύσουν τα 
προβλήματα, κατόπιν συζήτηση ως κλάση που η λύση είναι σωστή ή
η ευκολότερη. Μια εξήγηση της μεθόδου διδασκαλίας παρέχεται
μαζί με το βίντεο των σπουδαστών που παρουσιάζουν τις λύσεις τους
στα προβλήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una mirada dentro de una sala de clase del 
octavo-grado en la cual los estudiantes trabajen en pares para 
solucionar problemas, entonces discute como clase que la solución sea
correcta o la más fácil. Una explicación del método de 
enseñanza se proporciona junto con el vídeo de los estudiantes que 
presentan sus soluciones a los problemas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085961</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107909</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/the-problem-centered-classroom</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
